name: Path of the Abyss: Cursed Ascension
name_original: Path of the Abyss: Cursed Ascension
description:
(This game was originally made for Global Game Jam 2021, theme: Lost and Found)

Take the role of a spell-wielding knight that has been cursed and sent to the Abyss. This unique and powerful curse seems to take away all of your belongings every time you enter a new enter of the Abyss. Conquering this otherworldly dimension requires a great deal of planning, a handful of spellslinging, and a little bit of luck. Surrender your items, retrieve them one by one, and slay voidspawns left and right in this 2.5D hack-n-slash action game.

--

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • LMB - Attack
  • 1,2,3,4 - Cast Spells
  • Tab - Open Equipment Tab
  • F1 - View Controls

--

Winner of 1st Place Judges' Choice and 3rd Place People's Choice in Global Game Jam Online 2021 - College of St. Benilde Jam Site

Developers' note: This game is a proof of concept. There is no ending. Expect bugs, glitches, and balancing issues.
